title: High performance long chain polyesters via melt copolymerization of cutin-inspired monomers
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00454J, Paper
Zewen Zhu, Joshua Damron, Jong Keum, Logan Kearney, Vera Bocharova, Jeffrey C. Foster
Biopolymers have exhibited potential as sustainable and circular replacements to existing commodity thermoplastic polymers. However, current biopolymers are limited by poor thermomechanical performance compared with their petroleum-derived counterparts. Herein, we...
